reviews.text: Such a vibrant place and beautiful views

Excellent place to spend your leisure time.... View is awesome.... There are many beautiful cafe and restaurants around the place..... The old church is breathtakingly beautiful.... You will love to walk here....
 You can enjoy your coffee or drink in the sun or take a boat ride.... Or just do nothing....
Nice place,big and plenty of space for alot of different reasons, gives a nice feeling from it.nice to look at!!🐩💍

Nice place to spend one day off... Beautiful harvour especially with a sunny day, when there are the big flowerpots... You have one Nata shop there, one park divides for the main street but still a park, the river..
So much to do and to see. Lots of great restaurants, bars, touristy things and beautiful views not to far from town!
